qas.question: Devotion is an important part of the practice of most what?

context: Devotion is an important part of the practice of most <a0_0>Buddhists<a0_0/>. Devotional practices include <a1_0>bowing, offerings, pilgrimage, and chanting<a1_0/>. In Pure Land Buddhism, devotion to the Buddha Amitabha is the main practice. In Nichiren Buddhism, devotion to the Lotus Sutra is the main practice.
